class ObservableObject

Detailed Description

An Observer is informed about the change of a state of an Observable-Object by Observer::OnUpdate(ObservableObject *obs_obj). To get informed every Observer must attach itself to the Observable-Object by ObservableObject::Attach(this). An Observer may attach itself to several Observable-Objects.

See also:
ObservableObject

Member Function Documentation

void Observer::OnUpdate (  ObservableObject *  obs_obj  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked when the state of the Observable-Object obs_obj has been changed. To get invoked by the Observable-Object the Observer must attach itself by ObservableObject::Attach(this).

Reimplemented in UsbObexTransport, ProviderProxyContainer, ProviderProxyItem, AbstractDelegationProvider, IndicatorBar, IndicatorPaneObject, ObexAbstractTransport, UibFolderWin, UibInboxProvider, UibInboxTest, and UibPerformanceTest.
